医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人工智能工具可以准确起草对患者 EHR 查询的回复作为大流行期间出现的全国趋势的一部分，更多纽约大学兰格尼健康中心的患者开始使用电子健康记录 (EHR) 工具向医生提问、补充处方和查看测试结果。其中许多数字查询是通过名为 In Basket 的通信工具到达的，该工具内置于纽约大学朗格尼分校的 EHR 系统 EPIC 中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/AI-tool-can-accurately-draft-responses-to-患者-EHR-queries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/AI-tool-can-accurately-draft-responses-to-患者-EHR-queries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12f19599-c162-45dd-8189-125094c75291 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 15:26:00 -0400 AI tool can accurately draft responses to patients' EHR queries
特朗普的副总统人选 JD 万斯表示媒体歪曲了他关于堕胎和家庭暴力的言论在共和党全国代表大会开幕之夜，俄亥俄州共和党参议员 JD 万斯接受了福克斯新闻的采访，这是他作为前总统唐纳德·特朗普的副总统候选人的首次采访。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/JD-Vance-Trumpe28099s-VP-pick-says-media-twisted-his-remarks-on-abortion-and-domestic-violence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/JD-Vance-Trumpe28099s-VP-pick-says-media-twisted-his-remarks-on-abortion-and-domestic-violence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a9f55d9-a6c4-4c01-b163-a2c7feb4dc87 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 14:37:39 -0400 J.D. Vance, Trump’s VP pick, says media twisted his remarks on abortion and domestic violence
CePA：通过 mTOR 抑制缓解 MASH 的新型纳米药物代谢功能障碍相关脂肪性肝炎（MASH）是最常见的慢性肝病之一，主要由代谢紊乱和全身炎症反应引起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/CePA-Novel-nanomedicine-for-alleviating-MASH-via-mTOR-repression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/CePA-Novel-nanomedicine-for-alleviating-MASH-via-mTOR-repression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d8d8e7c-a165-44d2-b8a6-e83728c34d16 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 14:34:26 -0400 CePA: Novel nanomedicine for alleviating MASH via mTOR repression
了解吸烟和戒烟对南非艾滋病毒患者预期寿命的影响Krishna Reddy，医学博士、理学硕士，马萨诸塞州总医院医疗实践评估中心和烟草研究与治疗中心的医师研究员，哈佛医学院医学副教授，是最近在《杂志》上发表的一篇论文的资深作者国际艾滋病协会：南非接受抗逆转录病毒治疗的艾滋病毒感染者的吸烟、戒烟和预期寿命：模拟模型研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Understanding-the-impact-of-tobacco-smoking-and-smoking-cessation-on-life-expectancy-of-HIV-病人-in-South-非洲.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Understanding-the-impact-of-tobacco-smoking-and-smoking-cessation-on-life-expectancy-of-HIV-病人-in-South- Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37bfd648-ff96-441a-a978-1c4b803e8ee6 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 14:28:15 -0400 Understanding the impact of tobacco smoking and smoking cessation on life expectancy of HIV patients in South Africa
从儿科护理迅速转移到成人护理可能会减少镰状细胞病急性护理服务的使用镰状细胞病是美国最常见的遗传性红细胞疾病，可导致患者终生出现器官功能障碍、急性胸部综合征和中风等健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Swift-transfer-from-pediatric-to-adult-care-may-reduce-the-use-of-acute-care-services-in-sickle-细胞疾病.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Swift-transfer-from-pediatric-to-adult-care-may-reduce-the-use-of-acute-care-services-in-sickle-细胞疾病.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17edd28e-39c5-40e0-b5f4-63ae8948809e Tue, 16 Jul 2024 14:21:32 -0400 Swift transfer from pediatric to adult care may reduce the use of acute care services in sickle cell disease
研究分析了疗养院居民缺乏姑息治疗转诊的情况尽管疗养院有大量居民患有癌症、痴呆等严重疾病，但姑息治疗，即专注于缓解包括疼痛在内的症状和严重疾病压力的专门医疗护理，在疗养院中并未得到充分利用。 、帕金森病、心力衰竭或慢性阻塞性肺病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Study-analyzes-lack-of-palliative-care-referrals-for-nursing-home-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Study-analyzes-lack-of-palliative-care-referrals-for-nursing-home-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97b585d8-af23-4278-bd5f-f37cb979f462 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 14:12:08 -0400 Study analyzes lack of palliative care referrals for nursing home residents
探索肝细胞癌的辅助治疗选择肝细胞癌（HCC）是全球最常见的恶性肿瘤之一，也是癌症相关死亡的第三大原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Navigating-adjuvant-therapy-options-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Navigating-adjuvant-therapy-options-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=275a10e8-dde4-4ac5-8cac-5972e2cfa5f4 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 13:37:44 -0400 Navigating adjuvant therapy options in hepatocellular carcinoma
学龄前儿童的神经功能结构和意图理解到了三岁，孩子们就能够理解他人，“镜像”身边的人，模仿并预测他们的意图。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Neurooperative-architecture-and-intention-understanding-in-preschool-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Neurooperative-architecture-and-intention-understanding-in-preschool-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4db860e-1c5c-48ca-a2a4-845ecac25688 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 13:26:09 -0400 Neurofunctional architecture and intention understanding in preschool children
大肠杆菌基因组分析揭示了狗的抗生素耐药机制研究人员对抗生素耐药性大肠杆菌（全球范围内因抗生素耐药性而导致人类死亡的主要原因）进行了研究，他们在狗身上发现了一种可能使多种抗生素无效的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/E-coli-genomic-analysis-uncovers-antibiotic-resistance-mechanisms-in-dogs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/E-coli-genomic-analysis-uncovers-antibiotic-resistance-mechanisms-in-dogs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b908ca16-394e-4f4d-8137-6705ccc4bc79 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 13:03:54 -0400 E. coli genomic analysis uncovers antibiotic resistance mechanisms in dogs
用于肝细胞癌监测、诊断和治疗的超声技术肝细胞癌（HCC）是一种原发性肝脏恶性肿瘤，也是全球癌症相关死亡的主要原因之一。早期发现和准确诊断对于有效管理和提高生存率至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Ultrasound-techniques-for-the-surveillance-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240716/Ultrasound-techniques-for-the-surveillance-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44021764-bdfe-4d55-a6ed-6e72be71ceb5 Tue, 16 Jul 2024 12:50:01 -0400 Ultrasound techniques for the surveillance, diagnosis, and treatment of hepatocellular carcinoma
